H0.text: where do the astros play for spring training. Kissimmee

H1.text: where do the astros play for spring training. Tampa

H2.text: where do the astros play for spring training. Port St. Lucie

H3.text: where do the astros play for spring training. West Palm Beach

A4.text: The Astros have held their spring training at The Ballpark of the Palm Beaches in West Palm Beach, Florida since 2017.

A5.text: From 1985 to 2016, the Astros held spring training at Osceola Heritage Park in Kissimmee, Florida.
